replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 装net3.5和net4.0 说是你的netframe不支持direct3D

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Graphics Cards Issues
If you are receiving the error message of not finding a compatible graphics card, please make sure you have downloaded your most recent drivers for said graphics card. As well as updating tothe newest version of Direct X for your version of Windows.
Please also refer to this list of compatable cards.
http://www.xnawiki.com/index.php ... _card_compatibility

更新顯卡驅動
安裝符合Windows版本的最新版Direct X
看列表確定顯卡支援遊戲

replies.author: a24520234
replies.txt_content:
最令人惋惜的事
我的驅動是很爛的版本又是更新最慢的....

replies.author: 聖代鈴音
replies.txt_content:
a24520234 发表于 2011-9-24 17:47 
最令人惋惜的事
我的驅動是很爛的版本又是更新最慢的....
装.net 4.0的时候注意下是不是完整的
完整版是32位64位通用
文件名叫dotNetFx40_Full_x86_x64.exe
然后再装.XNA 4.0 显卡驱动更新到最新(如果显卡太弱XNA4.0真不支持就真没用了)
